entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
